projects.headline: Textual
projects.desc: Build amazing TUIs (Text User Interfaces) with this innovative Python framework

projects.headline: Rich
projects.desc: Beautiful output in the terminal and Jupyter notebook with this powerful Python library. Tables, panels, progress bars, trees, syntax highlighting, pretty printing, and much more.

projects.headline: Rich CLI
projects.desc: Rich from the command prompt. Syntax highlight many file-types, with special support for markdown, json, and CSV tables
